query:
SELECT 
            d.id
        FROM "Document" d
        JOIN "ItemLastAccessed" ila ON d.id = ila.item_id
        AND ila.item_type = 'document'
        AND ila.last_accessed < NOW() - ($2 || ' days')::INTERVAL
        WHERE d.owner IN (
            SELECT 
                u."id"
            FROM "User" u
            WHERE u."organizationId" = $1
        );
